name: StarClick
description:
Fight the aliens and gather resources with the clicking mechanics.

MagicaVoxel graphics, microphone sfx, generated music and lots of Lua code for the Defold game engine.

Report any bugs, I will try to fix them.

Game Content
  • 10 levels.
  • 4 human units.
  • 4 alien units.
  • 5 human buildings.
  • 4 alien buildings.
  • Lots and lots of clicking.
Game Controls
  • Select the blue base building on the map to see the construction menu on the left.
  • Use the mouse to click for resources and build units and buildings.
  • First, you have to build plates before you can build a factory. All buildings must be placed on plates.
  • Click a factory to construct a unit.
  • Select a unit with left click and command it to move or attack by right clicking the mouse on the map.
  • Press “F“ to toggle fullscreen.
  • Press “L“ to restart the current level.
Camera Controls
  • Orbit the camera by left clicking and dragging the mouse on the empty space of the screen.
  • Pan the camera by right clicking and dragging the mouse on the empty space of the screen.
  • Zoom the camera with the mouse wheel.

To win the game, destroy all the alien hives.
